msg: fix for ROL-1457 where the weblog entry setData() method was not copying the locale attribute.

author: agilliland
msg: cleaning up User pojo and removing old code and doing some reformatting.  also updated the old resetPassword() method to be more appropriate.

author: agilliland
msg: Weblogger's local planet fetcher should be using the user's screen name for the entry author attribute.

author: jstrachan
msg: zapped the servicemix-camel module as the code was starting to duplicate the camel-jbi module in the camel project; so I figured it was better to keep all that camel-jbi code together in one simple module (which is mostly camel specific really as the servicemix details are reused from servicemix-core and servicemix-common etc)
